title: Low fat tzatziki
ingredients: ['900g low-fat Greek yoghurt', '1/2 cucumber with peel, grated', '1 clove garlic, pressed', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 teaspoons grated lemon zest', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper']
